import React from 'react'; import { portfolioData } from '../data/portfolioData'; const About = () => { const { personalInfo, skills } = portfolioData; // Select key skills to showcase const keyTechnicalSkills = skills.technical.slice(0, 8); // First 8 technical skills const keySoftSkills = skills.soft.slice(0, 6); // First 6 soft skills return (

About Me

MERN Stack Developer | Problem Solver | Quick Learner

{ e.target.style.display = 'none'; e.target.nextSibling.style.display = 'flex'; }} /> {/* Fallback if image doesn't load */}

{/* Content Section */}

Hello, I'm {personalInfo.name}

I'm a dedicated 4th year Computer Science Engineering student at Saraswati Higher Education College (AKTU University) with expertise in MERN Stack development and various programming languages.

During my 60-day internship at Softpro, I honed my skills in full-stack development and earned an A+ grade for outstanding performance. I enjoy creating efficient, scalable web applications.

With strong problem-solving abilities and excellent communication skills, I thrive in collaborative environments and continuously seek opportunities to learn and grow.
